Description: Oblong oak panel bearing encaustic portrait of woman wearing pearl and gold earrings and loop-in-loop gold chain with central medallion over purple tunic.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Kom el-Kharaba el-Kebir (Previously recorded as Rubaiyat)
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 122 [91]. Portraits: De l’Egypte Romaine, Paris 1998, pp.146-147 [91].
Bibliographic references: Doxiadis 1995 / The mysterious Fayum portraits: faces from ancient Egypt. (28)
Paris 1998 / Portraits de l'Egypte Romaine : Paris, Musee du Louvre, 5 Octobre 1998 - 4 Janvier 1999. (no.91)
Parlasca & Seeman 1999 / Augenblicke. Mumienporträts und ägyptische Grabkunst aus römischer Zeit (p.193, no.96)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
